subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Michael Hoomanawanui appeared in 14 games during the regular season, missing two with a concussion, then stepped in for the injured Rob Gronkowski in the Patriots’ win over the Texans.
snippet: Michael Hoomanawanui appeared in 14 games during the regular season, missing two with a concussion, then stepped in for the injured Rob Gronkowski in the Patriots’ win over the Texans.
